summary.subject: Deadline Extended: CfP ICTAC'2025

call_for_papers.event: International Colloquium on Theoretical Aspects of Computing

summary.overview: The ICTAC conference aims at bringing together researchers from academia, industry, and government to present research and exchange ideas in theoretical aspects of computing. It promotes research cooperation between developing and industrial countries.
topics_of_interest: Lambda calculus, type theory, and category theory
invited_speakers: Antoine Girard, University Paris-Saclay, CNRS, France
Klaus Havelund, NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of Technology, USA
Joost-Pieter Katoen, RWTH Aachen University, Germany
Kim Guldstrand Larsen, Aalborg University, Denmark

publication_details.accepted_papers: All accepted papers will be published in Springer's Lecture Notes in Computer Science.
publication_details.best_paper_award: Springer sponsors the ICTAC 2025 Best Paper Award with a cash prize of 1,000 Euro.
publication_details.special_issue: There will be a special issue for selected papers from ICTAC 2025 in Elsevier’s journal Theoretical Computer Science.

general_chairs: Ahmed Bouajjani, Université de Paris, France
program_chairs: Heike Wehrheim, University of Oldenburg, Germany
